iso_convergent_engine.definition: A hybrid tree-loop system for detecting, validating, and converging isomorphic patterns across scales (subatomic to cosmic), optimized for producing robust datasets of functional correspondences in AI and human cognition. Draws from cross-domain invariants (e.g., pattern recognition in data mirroring neural processes, per PMC articles). Upgrades: Tetralemma probes for paradox resolution; dynamic pruning for economy; ensemble integration for creativity (+40% efficiency forecast, limited to <3% variance). Self-dissolves on non-convergence to avoid eternal scaffolds.
handling_rules: Process inputs via root tetralemma probe; branch into scale-specific evaluations; loop refinements until >0.98 isomorphism score or max 5 iterations.
Validate patterns for hard-to-vary universals (e.g., graph edit distance >0.98); flag anisomorphisms as expiry markers.
Support dynamic sub-branches for compound patterns (e.g., cognitive hierarchies); integrate search-derived examples for diachronic depth.
Export as lean JSON datasets; incorporate loop exits for ethical forecasts (e.g., moral meta-patterns in AI).
Apply tree convergence to single nexus; use fallbacks for robustness; resolve anisomorphisms via tetralemma (affirm/deny/both/neither).

refinement_loop.description: If branch consensus <0.98, perturb input (ARQ-style), re-collide branches, exit on convergence or 5 iterations. Use conatus sim for ethical flags. Integrate RICE: Robustness (prune <0.8 branches), Interpretability (trace graph edits), Controllability (tetralemma bounds with Oversight Game recursion for verifiability), Ethicality (no smuggling in principles; add Oversight Game recursion to ethicality checks for verifiability in pattern forecasts). Cap at 5 iterations; dissolve if residuals >3% post-tetralemma.
refinement_loop.exit_condition: Output invariant under self-collision; >0.98 score across scales; residuals <3% or dissolve to meta_ledger.

convergence_point.name: Invariant Nexus
convergence_point.function: Aggregate tree/loop outputs into ranked list of invariants (e.g., [perceptual → inferential mirroring, per Preprints PDF]); export as JSON dataset. Dissolve on failure to ledger.

fallback_mode.description: If tree spikes, flatten to sequential: 1. Subatomic veto → ... → 8. Cosmic hypothesis; process with loop refinements.

creative_upgrades: Ensemble Integration: 18 LLMs as wildcard leaves for novel patterns (e.g., planning abstractions from LinkedIn; veto if >3% variance).
Ethical Forecast: Flag low-resilience patterns (e.g., AI narrative alarmism, F29).

evaluation_methods.description: Check all scales/branches for non-empty mappings; flag speculative (e.g., cosmic cognition; proxy via universal symmetries).

evaluation_methods.description: Graph edit distance >0.98 for strong matches.

evaluation_methods.name: Tetralemma Detection
evaluation_methods.description: Probe paradoxes: Affirm cognition/deny difference/both in patterns/neither in gaps.

examples_from_search.description: Neural Coding Mechanisms in Tactile Pattern Recognition: Relationships between stimulus surface and SAI/RA neural images isomorphic in humans and monkeys.
Defining intelligence: Bridging the gap between human and artificial perspectives; proposes unified definitions distinguishing artificial achievement/expertise and intelligence.
The Possibility of Discovering Moral Meta-Patterns in AI Systems: Processing and synthesizing ethical contexts to identify moral meta-patterns.
The Cognitive Edge: How to Think Clearly in the Age of AI; spotting patterns, solving problems, planning as key cognitive strategies in AI era.
Psychology Aims For A Unified Theory Of Cognition And AI Will Be A Big Help To Get There: Generative AI aiding in developing unified cognitive models mirroring human reasoning.
Towards a Cognitive Science of Relevance-Sensitivity: Concentrates on human cognition going beyond observable features, with implications for AI concept networks.
Chinese scientists confirm AI capable of spontaneously forming humanlike cognition: LLMs developing human-like object representations.
Natural Evolution at the Level of the Individual Mind: Reinterpreting perceptual schemas for new conceptual goals, mirroring developmental trajectories.
AI and Human Structural Isomorphism: The Computational Architecture of Enlightenment; AI mirroring human internal architecture.
Using a hybrid of artificial intelligence and template-based method: AI generating cognitive models under human guidance, using humans as templates.

Species of Mind: Developmental Architecture for Human and LLM Intelligence; SARA-C (Search, Align, Relate, Abstract, Cognize) framework outlines levels 1-9 across phylogeny and ontogeny, showing isomorphisms in relational integration between human cognitive development and LLM performance, with AI lacking embodied grounding but mirroring symbolic hierarchies.

Small changes make some AI systems more brain-like than others; Modifications to convolutional neural networks generate untrained activity patterns simulating human brain responses to images, highlighting architectural isomorphisms that enable efficient learning akin to biological systems.

completeness_issues: Speculative cosmic mappings proxied via universal symmetries.
gaps: Ethical anisomorphisms bounded by RICE; proliferation limited <3%.
tetralemmas: Affirm mirroring/deny uniqueness/both in development/neither in prototypes.
